subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kobe Bryant said that he wanted Jerry West, who orchestrated a series of moves that brought Bryant and Shaquille O’Neal to Los Angeles in 1996, to rejoin the Lakers’ front office.
snippet: Kobe Bryant said that he wanted Jerry West, who orchestrated a series of moves that brought Bryant and Shaquille O’Neal to Los Angeles in 1996, to rejoin the Lakers’ front office.
